segments.text: What seems to be the problem , kid ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've got a sore throat , a runny nose and a headache .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah ... How long have you been like this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am not very sure . Maybe for three days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess so . It comes and goes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Open your mouth and say ah ... God , you are suffering from the swelling of tonsils .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I am sure that you got the flu . You need a shot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , doctor . Do I have to ? I am afraid of needles !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's for sure . But it is not that bad . It's gonna be all right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be brave , young man . Only girls cry when given an injection .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are right . I won't cry anymore .
segments.speaker: S2
